sub_fields.label: Hoverable Rows
sub_fields.name: table_hover
sub_fields.instructions: Enable hover state on table rows

sub_fields.label: Bordered
sub_fields.name: table_bordered
sub_fields.instructions: Add borders on all sides of table and cells

sub_fields.label: Small/Compact
sub_fields.name: table_small
sub_fields.instructions: Make table more compact by cutting cell padding in half

sub_fields.label: Active State
sub_fields.name: table_active
sub_fields.instructions: Highlight the table with an active state

sub_fields.label: Table Variant
sub_fields.name: table_variant
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a contextual color variant for the table

sub_fields.label: Responsive
sub_fields.name: table_responsive
sub_fields.instructions: Make table scroll horizontally on smaller devices

sub_fields.label: Vertical Alignment
sub_fields.name: table_vertical_align
sub_fields.instructions: Set vertical alignment for all table cells

sub_fields.label: Caption Position
sub_fields.name: caption_top
sub_fields.instructions: Position caption above table (default is below)

fields.label: Table Structure
fields.name: table_structure
fields.instructions: Choose how to structure your table data

fields.label: Table Rows
fields.name: rows
fields.instructions: Add table rows (first row typically contains headers)

sub_fields.label: Row Classes
sub_fields.name: row_classes
sub_fields.instructions: Additional CSS classes for this row (e.g., table-warning, table-success)
